then.line: Well... I'm not sure what you had in mind for legs, but... I hope this'll do.
Hm. I'll say it's not exactly what I had in mind...
But it's better than a kick in the pants!
Perfect! That's the last piece then, right?
Yup! For better or for worse, I guess. Just gimme a little time to work my magic...
Several minutes later...
All right! Let's meet our new friend. I present to you...
I think you're really gonna like what I found!
Wow! Prota! Great idea!
If this baby's on wheels, we're not just gonna see Minty, we're gonna chase her down!
Oooh, I'm so excited! It's been such a long day, I just want to get her back home.
Well hold on to your hat, Prota. I just need a little bit of time and I'll get this thing workin'!
Several minutes later...
All right, Prota. It's time to unveil....
Here you go, Randi! Think you can work with this?
Whoa!
What?
You got Minty on the brain, dontcha?
Why do you say that?
I mean...
Oh, it's fine! Let's just get this thing made. I'll need a couple minutes to get 'er goin, but just hang tight.
Several minutes later...
All right! Pleased to announce she's ready for action! I give you...
